items.content_html: This repository provides a lightweight, REST API powered by JSON Server, designed to handle dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a simple JSON-based database. It allows developers to quickly spin up a full API for testing, prototyping, and front-end development without the need for a real database or backend infrastructure
items.title: adham025/Dynamic-JSON-Server-CRUD: This repository provides a lightweight, REST API powered by JSON Server, designed to handle dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a simple JSON-based database. It allows developers to quickly spin up a full API for testing, prototyping, and front-end development without the need for a real database or backend infrastructure

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based finance tracker built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users can manage income and expenses by adding, deleting, and viewing transactions. The app dynamically updates the balance and stores data locally, displaying default data even after a page reload.
items.title: vinoth0803/Budget-Tracker-App-Static: A lightweight, browser-based finance tracker built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users can manage income and expenses by adding, deleting, and viewing transactions. The app dynamically updates the balance and stores data locally, displaying default data even after a page reload.
